description: An AuxiliaryTrafficArea is the ground surface of an AuxiliaryTrafficSpace.

properties.name: class
properties.description: Indicates the specific type of the AuxiliaryTrafficArea.

properties.name: function
properties.description: Specifies the intended purposes of the AuxiliaryTrafficArea.

properties.name: usage
properties.description: Specifies the actual uses of the AuxiliaryTrafficArea.

properties.name: surfaceMaterial
properties.description: Specifies the type of pavement of the AuxiliaryTrafficArea.
